name: Webflow Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Webflow Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle Webflow events via webhooks

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

site.name: site
site.description: Site that will trigger the events. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
site.natural_language_description: 参数名: Site Name or ID | 作用: Site that will trigger the events. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

event.name: event
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event | 默认值: form_submission | (必填项)
